item.title: Scatterplots
item.description: library(Lahman) library(sqldf) ## Loading required package: gsubfn ## Loading required package: proto ## Loading required package: RSQLite library(ggplot2) Step 1: Extract the Data In order to begin, we must fist bring into our Rmarkdown page the packages Lahman, sqldf, and ggplot2. We bring these in by using ‘library’ as shown above. We are then ready to extract our chosen data. We must do this and store the data in ‘result’ in order to link our scatterplot to the data we extracted.
